mapper.select: select * from t_product order by p_id, p_name
select * from t_product where p_name like "%"#{pName}"%" order by p_id, p_name

select jan_sale_num, feb_sale_num, mar_sale_num, apr_sale_num, may_sale_num, jun_sale_num, jul_sale_num, aug_sale_num, sep_sale_num, oct_sale_num, nov_sale_num, dec_sale_num from t_product t1 join t_sale t2 on t1.s_id = t2.s_id where t1.p_id = #{pId}

select jan_prd_num, feb_prd_num, mar_prd_num, apr_prd_num, may_prd_num, jun_prd_num, jul_prd_num, aug_prd_num, sep_prd_num, oct_prd_num, nov_prd_num, dec_prd_num from t_product t1 join t_produce_num t2 on t1.pn_id = t2.pn_id where t1.p_id = #{pId}
